channel.title: Videos on First Baptist Church Muncie
channel.description: Recent content in Videos on First Baptist Church Muncie

item.title: Wisdom in the Chaos
item.description: This has not been an easy year.

item.title: Lust or Love
item.description: Jesus calls his followers to radical adherence to the Law.

item.title: Anger
item.description: As Jesus expands and fulfills the Law, he addresses specific topics.

item.title: The Law
item.description: In Matthew 5:17-20, Jesus warns against throwing out the Old Testament in light of his life and ministry.

item.title: The Love of a Mother
item.description: On Mother’s Day, we take a break from the Sermon on the Mount series to travel a bit further back in time.

item.title: Kings and Priests
item.description: The familiar passage about salt and light is often simplified into Jesus’ followers serving as moral influencers in our broken world.

item.title: Blessed by God
item.description: As we come once again to the passage we call The Beatitudes, we consider how counter cultural and counter religious Jesus’ description of his followers might seem.

item.title: The Teaching of Jesus
item.description: As we prepare for our study on the Sermon on the Mount, we explore how to read this ever important section of Matthew’s gospel.

item.title: Risen
item.description: It is Resurrection Sunday and we gather to celebrate the Risen Christ.

item.title: Palm Sunday
item.description: As we begin Holy Week, we will walk through the story of Jesus’ arrest and crucifixion.

item.title: Surrender: Our Will
item.description: As we venture with Jesus into the Garden of Gethsemane, we explore Jesus’ courageous prayer in contract to the failings of the disciples.

item.title: Surrender: Resources
item.description: The story of the rich young man in Matthew 19 challenges our understanding of wealth.

item.title: Surrender Our Fear
item.description: In this video podcast, our pastor addresses the congregation at First Baptist Church in Muncie in the wake of the 2020 Coronavirus pandemic.

item.title: Surrender: Children
item.description: Northern Seminary President Bill Shiell preaches on Jesus’ teaching about children.

item.title: Surrender: Forgiveness
item.description: Peter asks Jesus an honest question.

item.title: The Transfiguration
item.description: The season of Epiphany ends with the story of the Transfiguration.

item.title: The Heart
item.description: In the season of Valentine’s Day, we think a lot about hearts.

item.title: Well Seasoned
item.description: In Matthew 5:13-16, Jesus challenges His followers to be salt and light.

item.title: Sermon on the Mount
item.description: Jesus gathers his disciples on a mountainside to teach them about true happiness.

item.title: Leave Your Nets
item.description: In Matthew 4:12-23 Jesus leaves his hometown to begin his ministry.

item.title: The Supremacy of Christ
item.description: Caleb Rolling is a student at Taylor University.

item.title: A Lesson in Humility
item.description: John the Baptist was deemed the greatest man every born by Jesus.

item.title: Way of the Wise Men
item.description: On this first Sunday of Epiphany, we consider the journey of the wise men.
